scripts.original:install: npm install --prefix original_a2ui_source/web && uv sync --directory original_a2ui_source/a2a_samples
scripts.original:demo: pnpm dlx concurrently --kill-others --handle-input=pipe --names=PY,WEB "uv run --directory original_a2ui_source/a2a_samples/a2ui_restaurant_finder ." "npm run dev --workspace @a2ui/restaurant --prefix original_a2ui_source/web"
